item.title: Open Source Authentication Solutions
item.description: Imagine you run a company and provide multiple web applications for your customers. In the beginning, you probably created a user table and the authentication methods yourself, but from the second application onwards, you will think about using already made open source solutions. That&rsquo;s the situation I am in right now. I run multiple web applications, which each have their own auth mechanisms and user tables. This means, a user from App1 can&rsquo;t use App2 unless he creates a new account.
